patient_info: Hematuria,Slurred speech,Abnormality of the liver,Dysphagia,Drooling,Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology,Hand tremor,Poor appetite,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:

2. Alport syndrome (Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome, Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome)
3. Hemolytic uremic syndrome (Hematuria, Slurred speech, Abnormality of the liver, Dysphagia, Drooling, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
4. lead toxicity (Hematuria, Slurred speech, Abnormality of the liver, Dysphagia, Drooling, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
5. Kidney disease (Hematuria, Slurred speech, Abnormality of the liver, Dysphagia, Drooling, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
6. Neurodegenerative disorder (Slurred speech, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
7. Metabolic disorder (Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
8. liver disease (Abnormality of the liver, Dysphagia, Drooling, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
9.铜代谢异常 (Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
